item.title: Password have a maximum of 12 characters
item.dc:creator: @xX4m4zingXx xX4m4zingXx
item.description:
@xX4m4zingXx wrote:

how can i make that a password have a maximum of 12 characters
it’s stabbingscape client v4.1
this is the password drawning:

j += 15; aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1272.method389(false, true, c / 2 - 90, 0xffffff, "Password: " + Class50.method588(aString1174, 0) + ((anInt1216 == 1) & (anInt1161 % 40 < 20) ? "@red@|" : ""), j); j += 15;
